title: Frosty

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Every night, Visit another player. You will learn 3 roles they could be.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - With the exception of the Everfrost, if you're targeted by any marking debuff, you'll die immediately to the heat. However, you are immune to being frosted and coldsnapped by the Everfrost.

desc:
Post 4036
*Frosty the Snowman, was a jolly happy soul...*
